Ant Man Wikipedia Ant Man From Wikipedia free encyclopedia Redirected from Ant man Jump navigation Jump search other uses see Antman Ant Man Mitchell Carson Eric O Grady on cover Irredeemable Ant Man vol April Art by Phil Hester Publication information Publisher Marvel Comics First appearance Tales Astonish September Created by Stan Lee Larry Lieber Jack Kirby In story information Alter ego Hank Pym Scott Lang Eric O Grady Team affiliations Avengers Abilities Superhuman strength agility Leading authority in myrmecology research Size shifting from nearly microscopic feet gigantic both at extremes Maintains strength normal size in shrunken state Ant Man name several fictional superheroes appearing in books published by Marvel Comics Created by Stan Lee Larry Lieber Jack Kirby Ant Man s first appearance was in Tales Astonish September persona was originally brilliant scientist Hank Pym s superhero alias after inventing substance that can change size but reformed thieves Scott Lang Eric O Grady also took on mantle after original changed his superhero identity various other aliases such as Giant Man Goliath Yellowjacket Ant Man has appeared in several films based on Marvel character such as Ant Man Captain America Civil War Ant Man Wasp Avengers Endgame Contents Fictional character biography Hank Pym Scott Lang Eric O Grady In other media Television Film See also References External links Fictional character biography edit Over years number different characters have assumed title Ant Man most whom have been connected with Avengers Hank Pym edit Main article Hank Pym original Ant Man was Biophysicist Security Operations Center expert Dr Henry Hank Pym decided become superhero after death his first wife Maria Trovaya had been political dissident in Hungary Falling in love with him believing that his American citizenship would protect her Hank Maria traveled Hungary shortly after marriage start new life together Unfortunately they were confronted by corrupt agents secret police Hank was knocked unconscious Maria was murdered Pym was greatly distraught by his wife s death decided do whatever he could in future battle injustice After discovering chemical substance which he called Pym Particles that would allow user alter his size he armed himself with helmet that could control ants After that Pym would shrink down size an insect become mystery solving Ant Man solving crimes stopping criminals He soon shared his discovery with his new girlfriend Janet van Dyne became his crime fighting partner Wasp he helped her avenge death her scientist father Vernon van Dyne was killed by an alien unleashed by one Vernon s own experiments duo would become founding members Avengers fighting recurring enemies such as mad scientist Egghead mutant Whirlwind Pym s own robotic creation Ultron While Pym original Ant Man he has adopted other aliases over years including Giant Man Goliath Yellowjacket Wasp after Janet s presumed death in Secret Invasion Leaving his original persona vacant his successors have taken up Ant Man role while Pym explored these other identities Scott Lang edit Main article Ant Man Scott Lang Scott Lang was thief became Ant Man after stealing Ant Man suit save his daughter Cassandra Cassie Lang from heart condition Reforming from his life crime Lang soon took on full time career as Ant Man with encouragement Hank Pym He became an affiliate Fantastic Four later became full time member Avengers period time he dated Jessica Jones He was killed by Scarlet Witch along with Vision Hawkeye in Avengers Disassembled his daughter took up his heroic mantle as Stature in book Young Avengers He returned life in in mini series Children s Crusade but lost his daughter she heroically sacrificed herself stop super charged Doctor Doom would later revive her during AXIS Eric O Grady edit Main article Eric O Grady Eric O Grady third character take up Ant Man title O Grady low level agent S H E L D stumbles upon Ant Man suit in S H E L D s headquarters man few morals willing lie cheat steal manipulate in order get ahead in life Eric stole armor his own selfish plans which included using his status as super hero seduce women humiliate torment others He had his own short lived title before being part other teams such as joining Avengers Initiative as his first team then joining Thunderbolts but more recently Secret Avengers character perished heroically while defending child against villain known as Father In other media edit Television edit Hank Pym made his animated debut as Giant Man Ant Man in Marvel Super Heroes series Hank Pym appears in his original Ant Man identity in Avengers United They Stand as team s leader Two versions Ant Man Hank Pym Scott Lang appear throughout Avengers Earth s Mightiest Heroes Scott Lang appears as Ant Man in Ultimate Spider Man television series Scott Lang appears as Ant Man in Avengers Assemble An Ant Man TV series was one several planned TV shows from Marvel in s Ant Man Scott Lang appears along with Hulk in Coke Mini commercial that premiered during Super Bowl Paul Rudd plays character in Marvel Cinematic Universe reprises role in commercial by providing voice Ant Man Marvel s Ant Man series animated shorts aired on Disney XD in Josh Keaton voiced Ant Man Melissa Rauch voiced Wasp series created by Passion Studios Ugo Bienvenu Kevin Manach Film edit Main articles Ant Man film Captain America Civil War Ant Man Wasp Avengers Endgame Paul Rudd as Scott Lang in Ant Man live action film featuring Scott Lang Hank Pym titled Ant Man was released on July film directed by Peyton Reed with screenplay by Edgar Wright Joe Cornish Adam McKay Paul Rudd from story by Wright Cornish Wright was slated direct film but left project in May due creative differences with studio In November Kevin Feige confirmed that aspects Eric O Grady s Ant Man would not be featured in film In December Paul Rudd was cast as Ant Man followed in January with casting Michael Douglas as Pym confirmation Rudd as Lang Reed said costume design was influenced by Asian tokusatsu superheroes such as Ultraman Inframan Rudd reprised his role in Captain America Civil War Ant Man Wasp Avengers Endgame Douglas also returned as Pym in both Ant Man Wasp Avengers Endgame See also edit Atom comics DC Comics superhero with similar ability shrink in size References edit Henry Pym Biography IGN Archived from original on January Retrieved April b Secret Invasion Illumination Marvel com May Archived from original on January Retrieved April
